## hpr0627 :: From OS X to OS Whoredom to Linux

 
Ruji tells her story of discovering FOSS and installing Sabayon Linux on a MacBook Pro. She also discusses Mac OS X, virtualization, and multimedia software.

Links:

Ruji's main site: https://rujic.net
Ruji's image gallery: https://supposedly.rujic.net/lookwhaticando
Musical guest Russian Paul's page: https://myspace.com/russianpaulband
